headline.main: Trump Expected to Sign New Travel Ban Order
headline.print_headline: Trump Expected to Sign New Travel Ban Order

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump is preparing to sign a revised executive order temporarily barring the entry of people from certain Muslim-majority countries and halting the nation's refugee program.
snippet: President Donald Trump is preparing to sign a revised executive order temporarily barring the entry of people from certain Muslim-majority countries and halting the nation's refugee program....
